Bellevue.KFFV: KFFV, virtual channel 45 (UHF digital channel 44), is a television station licensed to Seattle, Washington, United States, and also serving Tacoma. Owned by Weigel Broadcasting, it serves as an affiliate of MeTV, Movies! and Heroes & Icons on its three digital subchannels, all of which are simulcast on its Bellingham-licensed sister station KVOS-TV (channel 12).
